articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: iPhone 16 Pro To Reportedly Feature A 5x Tetraprism Periscope Zoom Lens Like The iPhone 15 Pro Max, No Word On The iPhone 16 Pro Max’s Hardware Changes - Wccftech
articles.description: A report claims that the iPhone 16 Pro will retain the 5x optical zoom camera, just like the one present on the iPhone 15 Pro Max
articles.content: Apple has been reported to add another supply chain partner to its list as it requires the extra workforce to supply the periscope zoom lens for both the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max. At the t… [+1763 chars]
